Description:
Be part of a team that designs, develops and integrates highly complex software functions within Honeywell Aero Services & Connectivity. You will be an active and integral member of a team to achieve the completion of goals. You will also generate innovative solutions in work situations; trying different and novel ways to deal with problems and opportunities.We are looking for experienced Software Development Engineer to support and develop Full Stack Web applications/ portals and services in Java Spring Boot and React JS. The successful candidate is going to be part of our agile software development team working closely with DevOps and Vendors for large volume data processing and integration to advanced web applications. The candidate will also need to be able to automate Unit Tests, Functional & Performance Tests using Junit, Katalon & Locust.We need people who can think on their own and see software as part of the entire product. The ideal candidate you should enjoy taking ownership of projects or defined deliverables and want to work in a collaborative environment with a small team. Creativity, independent thinking, and vision are required.Key ResponsibilitiesWork in an agile environment with other developers and our algorithm team to develop and implement new software programs.
Maintain and improve the performance of existing software.
Write high-quality, efficient, testable code.
Contribute to planning, design, implementation, testing, operations, and process improvement as a member of a Scrum team.
